title: Ontology Reuse: the Real Test of Ontological Design – materials
description:
This repository collects the supplementary materials to the article titled "Ontology Reuse: the Real Test of Ontological Design". 

Citation

If you use this data or code in research works, please cite this paper:

Sowiński, P., Wasielewska-Michniewska, K., Ganzha, M., Paprzycki, M., & Bădică, C. (2022). Ontology Reuse: The Real Test of Ontological Design. In New Trends in Intelligent Software Methodologies, Tools and Techniques (pp. 631-645). IOS Press.
